protein.specific_function: Probable cation channel with high affinity for sodium. In vitro, has no proton-gated channel activity

reference.reference_text: Grunder S, Geissler HS, Bassler EL, Ruppersberg JP: A new member of acid-sensing ion channels from pituitary gland. Neuroreport. 2000 Jun 5;11(8):1607-11.
